column5: Wonderful top notch Apartment in the heart of Houston. Very upscale with amazing surroundings. Minutes from Houston Medical Center, Rice University, U of H, Downtown, NRG Reliant Stadium, Convention Center, Houston Rockets Toyota center, Houston Astros/Minute Maid Park. Close to various attractions like Galleria, restaurants, Herman Park Golf course, Houston Zoo. Very close to major highways and highly secured. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers.
